content: the second marker in each row the spine stitches will always be knitted on the right side and purled on the wrong side cid 1 cid 1 cid 1 cid 1 the placement of stitch markers is coded m below slip the markers as you come to them cid 1 6 / / / / / j / / j j s j j d j j s j j d j x bobble bobble bobble bobble 5  cid 1 4 bobble bobble bobble bobble x / / / / j d j / / j d j m j j m m j j m 3  cid 1 2 / / / / / / / j d j / / j d j j j j j 1  add left edge middle center spine middle right edge 2 stitches cccchhhhaaaarrrrttttssss ppppaaaaggggeeee 6666 legend for details about how to work the stitches please see the abbreviations on page 3 knit on the rs / purl on the rs t knit tbl on the rs d k2tog on the rs j yarn over on the rs s ssk bobble bind off 1 stitch / knit on the ws purl on the ws t purl tbl on the ws d k2tog on the ws j yarn over on the ws v s2kp x stitch left on needle after binding off chart 1 1x right side work right edge sm middle sm knit 2 spine stitches sm middle sm left edge wrong side work left edge sm middle sm purl 2 spine stitches sm middle sm right edge 78 26 / / / / / / 26 / t / / j d j / / j d j j s j j d j d / t / s j s j j d j25 25 24 / / / / / 24 / / t / / / / j / / j j s j j d j d / / t / / s j s j j d j23 23 22 / / / / 22 t / / t / / t / j / / j j s j j d j d t / / t / / t s j s j j d j 21 x bobobobo 21 20 bobobobo x / / 20 / t / / t / / t / / / j d j / / j d j j j d / t / / t / / t / s j j 19 19 18 / / / / / / 18 / / t / / t / / t / / / j d j / / j d j j j d / / t / / t / / t / / s j j 17 17 16 / / / / / 16 t / / t / / t / / t / / t / /
